title: binutils: checksum fails for 2.35.1
body:
Using:
* `spack@develop`
* commit b08744566d28697db363a87a24671f81528e3dc1
* `Fri Nov 13 22:29:18 2020 +0530`

Checksum fails for `binutils@2.35.1`

```
$> spack install binutils@2.35.1
...
==> Installing binutils
==> Fetching https://ftpmirror.gnu.org/binutils/binutils-2.35.1.tar.bz2
##################################################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Error: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-binutils-2.35.1-va6aevecl3j4nrxixcmfvhfv2zyk45ik/binutils-2.35.1.tar.bz2
    Expected a8dfaae8cbbbc260fc1737a326adca97b5d4f3c95a82f0af1f7455ed1da5e77b but got 320e7a1d0f46fcd9f413f1046e216cbe23bb2bce6deb6c6a63304425e48b1942

/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1274, in do_fetch:
       1271        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)
       1272        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1273
  >>   1274        if checksum and self.version in self.versions:
       1275            self.stage.check()
       1276
       1277        self.stage.cache_local()
```

```
$> spack checksum binutils@2.35.1
==> Found 1 version of binutils:

  2.35.1  https://ftpmirror.gnu.org/binutils/binutils-2.35.1.tar.bz2

==> Fetching https://ftpmirror.gnu.org/binutils/binutils-2.35.1.tar.bz2
##################################################################################################################################################### 100.0%

    version('2.35.1', sha256='320e7a1d0f46fcd9f413f1046e216cbe23bb2bce6deb6c6a63304425e48b1942')
```

@hainest @michaelkuhn @adamjstewart @scottwittenburg
